original_title: Special traffic plan in place tomorrow for New Year’s Eve
original_body_lines: A special traffic plan is scheduled to be implemented in Colombo on 31 December, in view of the dawn of the New Year.

Accordingly, several roads including a section of Galle Road, Janadhipathi Mawatha, Bank of Ceylon Mawatha, Lotus Road and Nawam Mawatha will be made one-way from 05:00 p.m. tomorrow, police reported.
